title: Lesbian Vampires = Vampyros Lesbos
creator_credit: Telecine, Fenix Cooperative Cinematografica, Hispano-Allemande, Karl Heinz Mannchen and Jesus Franco
brief_description: Amidst psychedelic keyboard and sitar music comes the erotic horror story of a powerful lesbian vampire (Soledad Miranda). Linda (Ewa Stromberg), a lawyer, is having potent and erotic dreams that she can’t explain. Her work sends her to a small island where she meets the force behind her dreams and her life is taken over by the rule of the dark spirit world. Does she have the will to resist? Will her boyfriend and sympathetic psychiatrist get to her in time? A cult classic from the director of “Female Vampire”. Cast includes Susann Korda, Dennis Price, Paul Muller.
